tr.td: Duration in months since first starting ART/since starting current regimen

includeIf.td: Prevention with Positives/If pregnant EDD/EMTCT? Write gestation in weeks and ANC#

obs.labelText: Ever taken NVP or AZT during Pregnancy

tr.td: TB Status / TB Rx / District TB

td.label: Are there any symptoms of an STI?

obs.answerLabels: Genital Ulcers, Abnormal Vaginal Discharge, Urethral Discharge, Lower Abdominal Pain, Other

td.label: Have you disclosed your HIV status to your spouse/sexual partner?
Partner Status:

span.label: If Positive is he/she accessing care?

td.label: Screen for Cancer of the cervix in the past 1 year

span.label: Did client experience any problem since last visit?

obs.answerLabels: Skin rash,Skin Itching,Skin peeling,Patch on skin,Others

1-Poor Adherence,2-Missed appt in last 3months,3-KS lessthan 90,4-ART toxicities,5-Pregnant,6-On ART lessthan 1year,7-non ART CD4 lessthan 500,8-Co-morbidities,9-On 2nd line therapy,10-Dropping CD4 by morethan 100,11-Others
